message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start with a price of $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to sell it to you for $135. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $120. Can you consider $125?
I'm getting close to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my limit, but I can still stretch to $128. Can you meet me there?
I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell it to you for $129. That's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $125. Can you consider $127?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $129. I've already given you a good deal, and I think that's the best I can do. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I'm not willing to go above $125, and I'm not interested in buying from anyone else. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet in the middle. Can you seriously consider $126?
